data.en: The defendant is required to provide full financial disclosure within fourteen days of this order.
data.zh: 被告须在本命令发布之日起十四日内如实提供完整的财务披露。</translate>

translations.correct_style_correct_meaning: 被告须在本命令发布之日起十四日内如实提交完整的财务状况披露。</translate>
translations.correct_style_wrong_meaning: 被告须在本命令发布之日起十四日内向法院缴纳全部罚金。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_correct_meaning: 被告需要在这项命令生效后的两周内，把所有财务细节都公开出来。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_wrong_meaning: 他在命令下达两周后将领取所有的补助金。</translat>

data.en: The city has launched a new initiative to improve public transportation efficiency ahead of the upcoming holiday season.
data.zh: 为迎接即将到来的假日季，该市推出了一项旨在提升公共交通效率的新举措。</translate>

translations.correct_style_correct_meaning: 为迎接即将到来的假日季，该市启动了提升公共交通运行效率的新措施。</translate>
translations.correct_style_wrong_meaning: 为备战假日季，该市宣布将暂停全部公共交通服务。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_correct_meaning: 在假日季临近之际，市政府须采取措施提升公共交通效率。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_wrong_meaning: 假日季节来临时，城市的公共交通将化作光与影的流动，随心而动。</translat>

data.en: Our results demonstrate that the proposed algorithm achieves a 15% reduction in computational cost compared to baseline methods.
data.zh: 我们的结果表明，与基线方法相比，该算法将计算成本降低了15%。</translate>

translations.correct_style_correct_meaning: 研究结果显示，该算法相较于基线方法使计算成本降低了15%。</translate>
translations.correct_style_wrong_meaning: 研究结果表明，该算法的计算成本比基线方法提高了15%。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_correct_meaning: 数据显示，这项方法比以往的方案节省了大约15%的计算开销。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_wrong_meaning: 这项算法仿佛在数字海洋中迷失，使系统付出了额外的代价。</translate>

data.en: The moonlight drifted across the quiet lake, carrying with it the soft whisper of the night.
data.zh: 月光缓缓掠过宁静的湖面，带来了夜色轻柔的低语。</translate>

translations.correct_style_correct_meaning: 月光轻轻滑过平静的湖水，仿佛携来了夜晚柔和的呢喃。</translate>
translations.correct_style_wrong_meaning: 夜色沉重地压在湖面上，使湖水变得昏暗无光。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_correct_meaning: 夜间的湖面在月光照射下保持宁静，此为客观自然现象。</translate>
translations.wrong_style_wrong_meaning: 被告必须在月光下对湖面进行检查，并提交夜间报告。</translate>
